com.vmware.sso.client.soaphandlers

Class SSOHeaderHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vmware.sso.client.soaphandlers.SSOHeaderHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.xml.ws.handler.Handler<javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPMessageContext>, javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPHandler<javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPMessageContext>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HeaderCookieExtractionHandler, HeaderCookieHandler, SamlTokenExtractionHandler, SamlTokenHandler, TimeStampHandler, UserCredentialHandler, WsSecuritySignatureAssertionHandler, WsSecurityUserCertificateSignatureHandler

    public abstract class SSOHeaderHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPHandler<javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPMessageContext>
    Base Abstract class that all the header handler will be extending. 
     The reason for this abstract base class is two folds:
 1. Provide a common base class that can be utilized by the single
 HeaderHandlerResolver
 2. The subclasses can simply implement the handleMessage() method instead to
 creating dummy code for all the other methods as well
